```{r}
library(ggplot)

source("../parseData.R")
data <- readData("../data")
cowboys <- filterToTeam(data, "DAL")

#Find only those plays mentioning T. Romo
romo <- cowboys[grepl("T.[\\s]?Romo", cowboys$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE),]

#Remove plays in which he was the holder
romo <- romo[!grepl("Holder-T.[\\s]?Romo", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE),]

#Remove kneel-down from stats calculations
romo <- romo[!grepl("knee", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE),]

#Remove two-point
romo <- romo[!grepl("two.point", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE),]

#Remove penalties
romo <- romo[!grepl("penalty", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE),]

#Remove spikes
romo <- romo[!grepl("spike", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE),]

romo$result <- NA
romo$result[grepl("INTERCEPT", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Int"
romo$result[grepl("incomplet", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Inc"
romo$result[grepl("touchdown", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "TD"
romo$result[grepl("[\\s]complete", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Com"
romo$result[grepl("pass.*for[\\s]+(-)?[\\d]+[\\s]+yard", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Com"
romo$result[grepl("pass.*for[\\s]no gain", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Com"
romo$result[grepl("scramble", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Scram"
romo$result[grepl("sack", romo$description, perl=TRUE, ignore.case=TRUE)] <- "Sack"
```
